name: Solo Lock Screen
description: The product of Solo System by NewBornTown(NewBorn-Town). Simple and easy application to turn off your device with Solo Launcher. This plugin will enable Solo Launcher to use Double-tap to turn off screen feature. Locker Screen Master  HOW TO UNINSTALL - Please enter Solo Lock Screen, click on the Close button, and then uninstall as usual. OR - Disable administrator permissions in Settings -> Location & Security -> Select device administrators -> uncheck TurnOffScreen.
